item.title: Drain Issue on Vineyard Street, 14th November
item.description:
Drain outside Number 13 Vineyard Street is still not working. I don't know how many time I have to report this. This must be solved. This has been like this since Dec2024 as far as I can tell, but neighbours told me it's always been an issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vineyard Street, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked and flooding, 14th November
item.description:
Drain outside 11 College Road GL53 7HY is blocked with sludge and is flooding. This is lowest point in College Road so flooding of 11 and 15 College Road likely. This is despite personal regular repeated attempts at least twice weekly to clear the gutter and drain of leaves and debris
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, College Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding outside door as you have not fixed a tarmacing error from almost 2 years ago. Which created a ditch for water to sit in. The assessor came at beginning of this year to say will be done by next April 2026? Is that normal. I think not. I will have to take legal action against Gloucestershire Highway for not taking my concerns seriously enough. Nobody should have to wait almost 2 years to rectify a problem caused by your contractors., 14th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, King George Close, Cheltenham
